org.openjdk.tools.javac.platform

接口 PlatformDescription

  • 所有超级接口:
    AutoCloseable, Closeable

    public interface PlatformDescription
extends Closeable
    A description of settings needed for a particular --release name option.

    This is NOT part of any supported API. If you write code that depends on this, you do so at your own risk. This code and its internal interfaces are subject to change or deletion without notice.

    • 嵌套类概要

      嵌套类 
      限定符和类型 接口和说明
      static interface  PlatformDescription.PluginInfo<T>
      Returns the description of annotation Processor or javac Plugin that should be enabled in the current javac run.

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 抽象方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      void close()
      Perform cleanup for this PlatformProvider - this instance won't be used after this method is called.
      List<String> getAdditionalOptions()
      Returns the additional command line options that should be passed to javac.
      List<PlatformDescription.PluginInfo<Processor>> getAnnotationProcessors()
      Returns the annotation Processors that should be enabled in the current javac run.
      Collection<Path> getPlatformPath()
      Returns paths that should be used as the current platform's bootclasspath, or null if the default should be used.
      List<PlatformDescription.PluginInfo<Plugin>> getPlugins()
      Returns the javac Plugins that should be enabled in the current javac run.
      String getSourceVersion()
      Returns the source version that should be selected.
      String getTargetVersion()
      Returns the target version that should be selected.

    • 方法详细资料

      • getPlatformPath

        Collection<Path> getPlatformPath()
        Returns paths that should be used as the current platform's bootclasspath, or null if the default should be used.
        返回:
        the current platforms's bootclasspath, or null for default

      • getSourceVersion

        String getSourceVersion()
        Returns the source version that should be selected. Equivalent to -source N on the command line.
        返回:
        the required source version

      • getTargetVersion

        String getTargetVersion()
        Returns the target version that should be selected. Equivalent to -target N on the command line.
        返回:
        the required target version

      • getAnnotationProcessors

        List<PlatformDescription.PluginInfo<Processor>> getAnnotationProcessors()
        Returns the annotation Processors that should be enabled in the current javac run.
        返回:
        annotation Processors

      • getPlugins

        List<PlatformDescription.PluginInfo<Plugin>> getPlugins()
        Returns the javac Plugins that should be enabled in the current javac run.
        返回:
        javac Plugins

      • getAdditionalOptions

        List<String> getAdditionalOptions()
        Returns the additional command line options that should be passed to javac.
        返回:
        additional command line options

      • close

        void close()
    throws IOException
        Perform cleanup for this PlatformProvider - this instance won't be used after this method is called.
        指定者:
        close 在接口中 AutoCloseable
        指定者:
        close 在接口中 Closeable
        抛出:
        IOException - if unexpected problems occur during closing this provider
